title: GTA+
headline: GTA+
subtitle: The Gun Van
content:
GTA+ Members can claim 50% off all Gun Van Weapons and Throwables through December 9.

Those with an interest in illicit firearms can visit the Gun Van and make use of 50% off all Gun Van Weapons and Throwables. The Gun Van is always blipped on the map for GTA+ Members.

GTA+ Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel anytime. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
button: Select to sign up to GTA+
